item.description:
This group is designed for anyone who wants to meet some new friends and get out in Southern Maine! We'll do everything from going to the movies, reading books, going out to dinner, skiing, taking a walk, or trying a new adventure! Plus, we're always up for new ideas!

This group is especially designed if you would like to make new friends or just plain old get out and have some fun!

Are you new to the area? Do you just need to meet some new friends because life is constantly changing? Do you need to expand your horizons? Then this group is for you! Everyone is welcome, married, single, male or female.

Please be respectful of other members. If you don't have anything nice to say, please don't say anything at all. Unkindness will NOT be tolerated in this group. We aim to make everyone feel welcome!

Â 

***Participation in all activities is at your own risk and absolutely no liability is assumed by the group or any of the organizers.***

Restaurant Meetup Policy
Please remember, RSVP yes only if you plan to attend to allow us to make reservations. If you RSVP yes and change your mind on attending, you MUST provide at least 24 hours notice or you will be considered a "No Show". After 2 "no shows" to restaurant meetups, you will no longer be allowed to attend restaurant meetups.

ALL MEETUPS Policy
Please remember, RSVP yes only if you plan to attend an event to allow us to plan accordingly. If you RSVP yes and change your mind on attending, you MUST provide at least 24 hours notice or you will be considered a "No Show". After 5 "No Shows", you will no longer be able to attend meetup events.
item.name: Portland Out and About Group
